description:
This course will teach you how to set up your YouTube channel so you can start becoming successful on YouTube.

After reaching 100.000 subs on YouTube, I've proven to myself and others, that I know what I'm talking about when it comes to setting up YouTube channels correctly. How to deal with comments and likes, playlists, video settings etc.

In this course you will find over 50 lessons explaining in detail what you should do, and what you shouldn't.

You should take this course to learn how to build a solid foundation, on which you can build your YouTube Empire!
title: Ultimate YouTube Crash Course, Get 100.000 Subs Just Like Me
